care_instructions.watering: Most air-purifying plants prefer consistent moisture. Water when top inch of soil feels dry.
care_instructions.light: Tolerates low to medium light, but grows best in bright, indirect light.
care_instructions.soil: Well-draining potting mix with good moisture retention.
care_instructions.fertilizing: Apply diluted balanced fertilizer every 4-6 weeks during growing season.

timeline.action: Indoor growing period. Clean leaves to maximize air purification.
Spring growth begins. Good time for repotting if roots are crowded.
Active growth period. Check for adequate space and air circulation.
Growth slows. Reduce watering and fertilizing frequency.
